name: Crystal Cave - The Hidden Lights
description:
This project is based on the game "Crystal Cave" developed in the course "Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer" from GameDev.tv. My first game uploaded to Itch.io, i'm studyng game development and I think i did a good job. 

This game is a 3D platformer that explore the patience of the player, as you progress through the levels a terrifying voice attempts to trigger fear and frustration. The lights are a important factor to the game, once you collect a crystal you are left alone in a dark place.
